headline: New Buffett-Inspired ETF Holds Berkshire and Apple. It Aims for 15% Yield.
summary: The ETF, which finished Wednesday at $19.15, is one of many that use the sale, or writing, of call options to augment income.

headline: Why American Express Stock Bumped Higher on Monday
summary: American Express is giving its Platinum cards an update.  With news of upcoming changes to its most popular product, American Express (NYSE: AXP) was a winner on the stock market as the trading week began.  Before market open, AmEx announced a series of major updates to its premium Platinum Card, a bonus-packed card that is its No. 1 product.

headline: American Express hints at a big upgrade to its Platinum card, designed to lure a lucrative and fast-growing segment of customers
summary: Cardholders between their 20s and 40s make up 75% of Amex's new accounts acquired on its two premium cards, Platinum and Gold.

headline: American Express Announces Major Updates Coming to U.S. Consumer and Business Platinum Cards® Later This Year
summary: NEW YORK, June 16, 2025--American Express (NYSE: AXP) is announcing today major updates coming to its U.S. Consumer and Business Platinum Cards® later this year. With these updates, the company is making its largest investment ever in a Card refresh.
